EmailTemplate.name: HeadStart EOI Birmingham Autumn 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Want to continue your NCS journey with The Challenge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An exclusive opportunity for YOU from The Challenge…
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you are having an amazing time on NCS and a great Showcase today! As you heard earlier, HeadStart is a NEW and LIMITED opportunity that is open to you.
HeadStart will:
GUARANTEE you an interview for a part time JOB
Provide EMPLOYMENT workshops from industry EXPERTS
Provide SKILLS and EXPERIENCE
Help build a standout CV and UCAS application
Give you a chance to get back with FRIENDS from NCS and meet new people
Allows you to make an IMPACT in your COMMUNITY
The HeadStart programme is made up of three simple steps:
Volunteer for at least 16 hours before February 2015. You can choose from lots of great volunteering opportunities on the HeadStart website (we will then match you up and arrange for your first day of volunteering), or you can decide to find your own volunteering opportunity.
Engage in exclusive skills workshops, developed with leading employers to give you the right skills and aptitude to get ahead, including expert communications coaching and interview preparation sessions.
Get a guaranteed interview for a paid part-time/seasonal job with New Look or Starbucks.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST
(Details of how to sign up coming soon)
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on facebook.
The HeadStart team
